description: Single storey side extension (following demolition of existing garage and fire escape staircase); replacement of property windows; installation of new window (southern elevation); partial infill of existing opening to window (northern elevation); installation of conservation style roof lights; installation of PV panels to roof; works to existing trees/hedgerow; replacement front wall; and single storey detached shed.

phasing_details.phase_detail: Commencement in combination with prior grant of permission Ref.216762FUL

decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings and document title number(s): 581312- XXXX-MAC-COR-XX-DR-A-0001 Rev 2 (Existing Location Plan); 581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0301 Rev P02 (Existing Site Plan); 581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0302 Rev P02 (Existing Floor Plans); 581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0303 Rev P03 (Existing Elevations);581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0304 Rev P05 (Proposed Site Plan); 581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0305 Rev P02 (Proposed Floor Plans);	581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0306 Rev P03 (Proposed East & North Elevations); 581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0307 Rev P05 (Proposed South & West Elevations); 581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0308 Rev P01 (Typical Window Detail); 581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0309 Rev P02 (Typical PV Details); 581312-4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0320 Rev P03 (Local Perspective Views); 4882-BOX-COR-XX-DR-A-0310 Rev P01 (Garden Shed Details); 4882-BOX-COR-00-DR-A-2501 Rev P02 (Fire Strategy Plan - Level 00); 4882-BO -COR-01-DR-A-2502 Rev P02 (Fire Strategy Plan - Level 01); 4882-BOX-COR-02-DR-A-2503 Rev P02 (Fire Strategy Plan - Level 02); Planning Statement Dated 2 July 2022; Design and Access Statement Dated June 2022.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise indicated on the hereby approved plans listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings and special character of the Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D4 and D6 of The London Plan (2021), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Core Strategy (2012). | The hereby approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the tree protection measures identified within the following documents: Arbtech TPP 02 Demo Rev A (Tree Protection Plan); Arbtech TPP 02 Con Rev A (Tree Protection Plan); Arboricultural Method Statement Dated 5 August 2022; Arbtech AIA 02 (Arboricultural Impact Assessment).

Reason: To ensure appropriate tree protection in the interests of protecting the visual amenity of the area, contributing to the quality and character of London's environment, air quality and adapting to and mitigating climate change in accordance with Ealing SPG 9, policy 5.10 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies SI 1, SI 2 and G7 of the London Plan (2021).

| No trees, shrubs or hedges within, or in proximity of, the site shall be felled, uprooted, wilfully damaged or destroyed, cut back in any way or removed unless approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Any trees, shrubs or hedges removed without consent or dying or being severely damaged or becoming seriously diseased within 5 years from the completion of the development hereby permitted shall be replaced with shrubs or hedge plants or similar species capable of
achieving a comparable size unless the Local Planning Authority gives written consent to any variation.

Reason: To ensure appropriate tree protection in the interests of protecting the visual amenity of the area, contributing to the quality and character of London's environment, air quality and adapting to and mitigating climate change in accordance with Ealing SPG 9, policy 5.10 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies SI 1, SI 2 and G7 of the London

Plan (2021). | Details of the replacement windows hereby approved shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to their installation and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. The details shall include 1:20 cross sectional drawings, materials, glazing, fixings and glazing bars. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Reason: To ensure that the windows harmonise with the surroundings and does not result in harm to the special character of the Conservation Area, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
